Sentencas: Thin films of La and Si with Si/(La + Si) atomic ratios ranging from 036 to 0.44 were produced by magnetron sputtering in pure Ar.
Titulo: Lanthanum silicate thin films for SOFC electrolytes synthesized by magnetron sputtering and subsequent annealing

Sentencas: For all compositions, the apatite-like La9.33Si6O26 phase was formed during annealing in air at 900 degrees C. A preferential orientation was developed during annealing of the films with higher silicon content while formation of oxide impurities was detected for the films with less silicon.
Titulo: Lanthanum silicate thin films for SOFC electrolytes synthesized by magnetron sputtering and subsequent annealing

Sentencas: Silicon segregation to the thin film/substrate interface was observed after annealing for thin films with higher Si/(La + Si) atomic ratios.
Titulo: Lanthanum silicate thin films for SOFC electrolytes synthesized by magnetron sputtering and subsequent annealing

Sentencas: The higher ionic conductivity values were obtained with the films with lower silicon content (2.81 x 10(-3) Scm(-1) at 800 degrees C for the film with Si/(La + Si) atomic ratio of 0.36).
Titulo: Lanthanum silicate thin films for SOFC electrolytes synthesized by magnetron sputtering and subsequent annealing

Sentencas: This film presented the lower activation energy E-a (0.94 eV).
Titulo: Lanthanum silicate thin films for SOFC electrolytes synthesized by magnetron sputtering and subsequent annealing
